As far as philosophy goes, Socrates. The center of wester philosophy. A bit typical I know, but hey!

socrates was fat. :)

 Yep, he pretty much wore the same cloack all year round, barefoot in all weathers, and he was considered extremely ugly . Little is known about him, even his real name is in question.

It was Socrates who made the ultimate sacrifice in the defence of wisdom and free speach. In his martadam I believe his spirit shall stay imortal in the hearts of men. In grasping this realisation I am sure that is why he was so quick to down the hemlock. Who would miss an opertunity like that. The weak of mind?
 
 Should thinkers run the state. What a inspireing change that would make. A great example of this being the case is Markus Aurelius. (off Gladiator Fame). This man put the empire on its feet and gave it another good 400 years.
 
 Nietzsche on the other hand may have went mad in office. We would be left with another Nero. In the persute of ultimate truth it is important to have a solid spiritual base. Poor old Nietzsche was unbalanced. This is obvious in his works. It was very dificult to control his mind he let it power of like a rocket. The emotional imbalance is obvious in his works. It is also true to say he was before his time. He fortold of the coming colapse within european christian culture and was single handedly trying to stop it.
 
 It is obvious Nietzsche could have become a hitler and it is remarcable the simularities in there emotional states. They were simply expressed in different mediums. I in no way wish to asert that Hitler was any where as smart as Nietzsche however I do believe hitler was smarter than generaly given credit for. Thoes intulectuals that to not ground their minds with a solid spiritual base somtimes end up insane. I believe this is what happened to Hitler. Thier are striking simularities between Nietzches Man and the actions of the Furer. I do not believe Nietzsche advocated National Socialism I believe he was saying that it would occur if the underliying hypocrasy with in Theoligy was not adressed. He did go mad anything is possible when your out there. Some people come back not many.
